title: Speaker Diaphragm Excursion Prediction: deep attention and online adaptation. (arXiv:2305.06640v1 [eess.AS])
abstract: Speaker protection algorithm is to leverage the playback signal properties to prevent over excursion while maintaining maximum loudness, especially for the mobile phone with tiny loudspeakers. This paper proposes efficient DL solutions to accurately model and predict the nonlinear excursion, which is challenging for conventional solutions. Firstly, we build the experiment and pre-processing pipeline, where the feedback current and voltage are sampled as input, and laser is employed to measure the excursion as ground truth. Secondly, one FFTNet model is proposed to explore the dominant low-frequency and other unknown harmonics, and compares to a baseline ConvNet model. In addition, BN re-estimation is designed to explore the online adaptation; and INT8 quantization based on AI Model efficiency toolkit (AIMET\footnote{AIMET is a product of Qualcomm Innovation Center, Inc.}) is applied to further reduce the complexity. The proposed algorithm is verified in two speakers and 3 typical deplo

Title: Speaker Diaphragm Excursion Prediction: deep attention and online adaptation. (arXiv:2305.06640v1 [eess.AS])
Abstract: Speaker protection algorithm is to leverage the playback signal properties to prevent over excursion while maintaining maximum loudness, especially for the mobile phone with tiny loudspeakers. This paper proposes efficient DL solutions to accurately model and predict the nonlinear excursion, which is challenging for conventional solutions. Firstly, we build the experiment and pre-processing pipeline, where the feedback current and voltage are sampled as input, and laser is employed to measure the excursion as ground truth. Secondly, one FFTNet model is proposed to explore the dominant low-frequency and other unknown harmonics, and compares to a baseline ConvNet model. In addition, BN re-estimation is designed to explore the online adaptation; and INT8 quantization based on AI Model efficiency toolkit (AIMET\footnote{AIMET is a product of Qualcomm Innovation Center, Inc.}) is applied to further reduce the complexity. The proposed algorithm is verified in two speakers and 3 typical deplo
translated_title: 扬声器振动预测：深度关注和在线适应
translated_abstract: 扬声器保护算法旨在利用播放信号的特性，同时保持最大响度，防止过度振动，特别是对于带有小型扬声器的移动电话。本文提出了有效的深度学习解决方案，以准确地建模和预测非线性振动，这对于传统解决方案是具有挑战性的。首先，我们建立了实验和预处理流程，在此过程中，反馈电流和电压被采样作为输入，采用激光来测量振动作为基础真相。其次，我们提出了一个FFTNet模型来探索主要的低频和其他未知的谐波，并与基线ConvNet模型进行比较。此外，设计了BN重新估计来探索在线适应；基于AI模型效率工具包（AIMET）的INT8量化被应用于进一步降低复杂性。该算法在两个扬声器和三个典型部署中进行了验证。
tldr: 本文提出了一种深度学习算法，实现了扬声器振动的准确预测和在线适应，为小型移动设备的音频保护提供了有效的解决方案。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a deep learning algorithm for accurate speaker diaphragm excursion prediction and online adaptation, providing an effective solution for audio protection of small mobile devices.
